Title: Branford Marsalis releases Crazy People Music
Description: A critically acclaimed post-bop album with his quartet.

Title: Wynton Marsalis releases Standard Time, Vol. 3
Description: Showcases his dedication to jazz standards and acoustic jazz.

Title: Pat Metheny releases The Road to You
Description: A live album featuring his World Jazz Trio.

Title: Diana Krall releases debut album Stepping Out
Description: Launches her career blending jazz vocals with piano skills.

Title: Joshua Redman releases debut album
Description: Establishes him as a leading saxophonist of his generation.

Title: Brad Mehldau releases debut album Introducing Brad Mehldau
Description: Begins his influential career as a jazz pianist.

Title: Esperanza Spalding is born
Description: Future bassist and vocalist who would win multiple Grammys.

Title: John Scofield releases Bump
Description: Blends jazz with funk and rock influences.

Title: Chick Corea Elektric Band reunites
Description: Revives fusion style with technical virtuosity.
